wave_0_per_point1=speed = bass_att*0.8;
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=//set the *0.08 part lower for high bass
wave_0_per_point4=v = sample*10000 + value2*bass*0.08;
wave_0_per_point5=
wave_0_per_point6=xs = xs + sin(v)*speed*atan(v*1.51);
wave_0_per_point7=ys = ys + sin(v)*speed;
wave_0_per_point8=
wave_0_per_point9=x = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(xs*0.1)*cos(time*2 + xs);
wave_0_per_point10=y = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(ys*0.1)*cos(time*2.1 + xs);
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=x = x*0.6 + 0.1*(0.4*sin(q2*1.575) + 0.6*sin(q2*1.36));
wave_0_per_point13=
wave_0_per_point14=r = r + 0.5*sin(time*1.22);
wave_0_per_point15=g = g + 0.5*sin(time*1.307);
wave_0_per_point16=b = g + 0.5*sin(time*1.959);
wave_0_per_point17=
wave_0_per_point18=xs = if(above(xs,800),0 ,xs);
wave_0_per_point19=ys = if(above(ys,1000),0 ,ys);

wave_1_per_point4=xs = xs + sin(v)*speed*atan(v*1.51);
wave_1_per_point5=ys = ys + sin(v)*speed;

wave_1_per_point7=x = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(xs*0.1)*cos(time*2 + xs);

wave_1_per_point9=
wave_1_per_point10=x = -x*0.6 +  1 - 0.1*(0.4*sin(q2*1.575) + 0.6*sin(q2*1.36));;
